Pre-Game Insights: The Dallas Mavericks will take on the Chicago Bulls in NBA action at American Airlines Center on Thursday, commencing at 12:30pm AEDT.
With star players Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving and Klay Thompson, the Mavericks are looking to overcome a Bulls line-up that includes Coby White, Nikola Vucevic and Josh Giddey.
